ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Van Helsing vs. Dracula
ComicInfo.Summary:
Whispers of War
When an ancient connection between Dracula and Hades is revealed, Liesel Van Helsing begins to doubt the one man she trusted. With Mina now Dracula's willful captive, Helsing and her team must regroup and figure out how to do what no one has ever done before... kill the vampire who can't die.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ricardo Ortiz & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Emilio Laiso | 2 | C | Cover C | Joe Pekar & Victor Bartlett | 3 | D | Cover D | Billy Tucci & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | Action Figure Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Deacon Black | Missing | F | VIP Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Deacon Black | Missing |
